https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8m9YHQMNOd2eUvxY346vf8JPOXE.jpg Jean-Marie Straub's first film after the death of Danièlle Huillet is a love poem to her. Le Genou d'Artémide is based on Cesare Pavese's "Dialogues of Leuco", which had already been adapted by Straub et Huillet as Ces Rencontres Avec Eux (2006). Artemide's Knee
